entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who was shouted at by Ron. He is described as coming to an unsteady halt before them.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who had the idea of getting rid of the basilisk. He is also described as saying that it was his idea.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as breathlessly defending Ron's idea and describing how they were going to get rid of the basilisk.

relationships.description: Ron had the idea of getting rid of the basilisk, which was mentioned by Hermione.
Hermione defended Ron's idea and described how they were going to get rid of the basilisk.
